category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 11 (Composition of general meeting)
contents: Article 11 (Composition of the general meeting) ① The general meeting of the city/provincial sports council shall consist of representatives from the heads of regular member organizations. Revised 2017. 3. 23., 2021. 10. 6. 1. Deleted 2021. 10. 6. 2. Deleted 2021. 10. 6. ② If the delegate under Paragraph 1 is unable to attend the general meeting due to unavoidable reasons, the Vice President A representative may be appointed to attend. In this case, the representative's authority is the same as that of the representative only at the relevant general meeting. Revised on October 6, 2021. ③ If a representative is appointed pursuant to paragraph 2, the fact must be notified in writing (including electronic documents) to the city/provincial sports council by the day before the general meeting. Revised on July 5, 2023. ④ If a person with representative qualifications under paragraph (1) becomes an executive of a city/provincial sports association, he or she will lose his/her representative qualifications, and a vice president recommended by the relevant organization will become a representative. Revised 2016. 4. 29.
